website_summaries.verdict: A low-priced neck brace with  dimensions that are appropriate for the average-size woman or man. However, a petite person may find it too large.
pros: This brace has a sturdy, durable foam core
Use it to stabilize and encourage healing
Cotton outer layer is machine washable and comfortable
cons: Some owners find it difficult to achieve a good fit

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and it stopped his snoring
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help my husband stop snoring (as per lots of online research ) before we went to the expense and annoyance of a CPAP machine...and guess what?? IT WORKS! Very comfortable and it stopped his snoring! It's such an easy fix, too bad I didn't know about this years ago. Cervical collars STOP snoring! Hallelujah!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Product states is adjustable. However if u have a ...
customer_reviews.text: Product states is adjustable. However if u have a big neck it may not fit. I have 16 inch neck and it will not fit.
customer_reviews.author: treeRigger

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky and "no return" policy  !
customer_reviews.text: This collar is HUGE ! Material is very stiff and uncomfortable and unless you have very long neck you will feel like you are choking. This item also can not be returned ( I did not know that) , so this was complete waste of time and money for me.
customer_reviews.author: nv

customer_reviews.title: Great pice!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed to replace his cervical collar. I checked Amazon for these cervical collars and was surprised the variety. Since my husband just wears his at night time when he sleeps, We did not need anything fancy. They are actually the same type as the one he bought at a DME supply and a lot cheaper. I'll be ordering more for him.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great Cervicalo Collar
customer_reviews.text: Collar is exceptionally wide expecting a wider, larger neck. My husband has difficulty keeping his head up, so this wide collar is almost too wide. I also ordered a 2 1/2 inch collar which works better for him. This collar is well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: patmack

customer_reviews.title: Cervical support
customer_reviews.text: I'll give it a 5 it does what it's supposed to do,but it's to long when you are petite. Get a 2"
customer_reviews.author: EREM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Halloween costume and was not disappointed! It was comfortable even without me having an injury. Also kept my neck secure and sturdy. As you can see from the picture, I had fake blood on which got on the neck brace. It washed right out with this material! I would recommend this for anyone who needs a brace for medical reasons or leisure!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy AF and Affordable. I hold my stress on my neck and shoulders. Wear this overnight and the next morning I’m feeling amazing. The FREE extra neck extender ( that comes with purchase ) really helps to tighten my neck brace. Definitely give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Kabaam

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for a neck brace
customer_reviews.text: As I get older, I tend to fall asleep while on the computer and wake up suddenly with a sudden neck jerk. Is has given me neck pain several times. I decided to try the neck brace while watching late night TV or computer movies and it is working out very well. Good fit, durable and easy to put on. Have had it for several weeks and think it is a good buy at a low price. I was going to order a more expensive one till I found this one advertized
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping. Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Very effective. Works well. I like the cover. Its going to make keeping it clean a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Birmingham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for sleep
customer_reviews.text: I got this for neck support while sleeping and after 3 days of use I notice a drastic improvement in neckpain and sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Karl sherman

customer_reviews.title: I have a short neck but this fits comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My Dr recommended for sleep apnea and morning headaches. Works well
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I found this to be extremely stiff. It might ...
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be extremely stiff. It might benefit some people but it is uncomfortable and too bulky for me. I'm using my older neck collar for now.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Love the Universal Cervical Collar👌🏽
customer_reviews.text: I sleep so much better using Universal Cervical Collar. I had neck surgery 6 years ago and now have arthritis in my neck. When I wear the collar I wake up without pain.
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: Support for your neck.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. I always get stiff necks and it helps me by keeping my neck straight when I sleep. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for occasional neck issues. The support is great and is good quality, should last forever
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Collar sent was wider than stated.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a 3 inch collar. It is close to 4 inches and too wide for me. Also it is very stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite

customer_reviews.title: I like the chin contour shape.
customer_reviews.text: It isn't the most comfortable thing, but I didn't expect it would be. It stabilizes your neck like its supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Ann R Jones

customer_reviews.title: Hot to wear; does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. If you need a cervical collar, this one's OK. Wish it was made with some other material that wouldn't be so hot.
customer_reviews.author: starrlight

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff and bulky
customer_reviews.text: I found this collar to be very stiff and uncomfortable. I have one that I've been using, different brand, and it fits nice so I ordered the same size but this one is way to big and bulky for my preference.
customer_reviews.author: bellam

customer_reviews.title: comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Priced right, good quality and comfortable to wear . cut out for chin to rest on , and supports well
customer_reviews.author: Peaches H2oman

customer_reviews.title: Its ok. I believe it was a one size ...
customer_reviews.text: Its ok. I believe it was a one size fits all but it is actually large on me the velcro closure could be a little longer so i could get it maybe 1/2 inch tighter, also I probably need a 4" one, there is quite a bit of movement for me in the 3". But defiantly worth $8
customer_reviews.author: Jill Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Too big to be effective.
customer_reviews.text: Item is not effective because it is way too big to fit around my neck snugly. Can’t return it so this was not a good purchase. Don’t buy unless you take a measurement as this is definitely not a universal fit. I am a 6’ tall woman.
customer_reviews.author: Arianne Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Too LARGE
customer_reviews.text: Wayyy to BIG!!!! Absolutely ridiculous!! No way it would even fit a gorilla! AND they won’t let you return it! DONT waist your money on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awkward Fit
customer_reviews.text: This fits very awkwardly. I'm not a particularly small person and don't have a uniquely sized neck, but the brace did not fasten properly.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Young

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Product was not one size fits all. Came in and it is way to big even with velcro strap.. There is also a none return policy which is not published. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: I somehow lost the one I bought at the pharmacy. This one is just like it. Lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Stork

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my whiplash patients. Works as good as the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Tmaya

customer_reviews.title: completely useless product
customer_reviews.text: This product is completely useless and unfortunately it's not eligible for a return. It does not prevent motion. It's just a soft foam around the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I brought this collar for my husband and he said it helped alot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price, I would give 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good support for your neck. I started feeling the difference after putting it on for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: emoasin1

customer_reviews.title: The width is way smaller than the one shown in ...
customer_reviews.text: The width is way smaller than the one shown in picture so that It cannot support my neck. Also you cannot return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for neck brace!
customer_reviews.text: I had no problem with brace. Thank goodness it was under $10. In a few months it wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. G

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable for me but maybe ok for someone with large ...
customer_reviews.text: Too big for average size women such as myself. Not comfortable for me but maybe ok for someone with large neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Product was just exactly as described and arrived on time. Great!
customer_reviews.author: C. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: stay away
customer_reviews.text: the product was not as good as expected and on top of that it could not be returned so be very careful of what you ask for
customer_reviews.author: Abhinav Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: helps my neck,, wish there is a dark color to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I did not order this neck brace its being sent back
customer_reviews.author: Mark johnson

customer_reviews.title: Way too long. Who has a 22 inch neck ...
customer_reviews.text: Way too long. Who has a 22 inch neck?! Not universal at all. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. West

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. It seems to be a bit stiffer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Relief!
customer_reviews.text: My shipment came earlier than expected. It is hastening my healing, no doubt--once once gets over the aesthetic visual ;) A great value and definitely goes a long way to help lessen the cost of healthcare today!
customer_reviews.author: Susan D. Gavazzi

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!  Not a Universal cervical collar
customer_reviews.text: This is 22" long, which seems like it will only fit a giant person. My neck is less than 14" around. Since this seller will not accept returns for this collar, and the collar will not overlap due to the position of the velcro, I will remove the inset velcro flap & sew it farther in so it will connect. Disappointed, because this is not Universal" at all!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C.

customer_reviews.title: Cleared up problem.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this neck brace to fit tight to my chin to keep my mouth closed at night. It works perfect. I have a bad problem with dry mouth from sleeping with my mouth open and this takes care of that. I also have jaw spasms that close my mouth hard when I sleep without this item and consequently I bite my tongue and inside of cheek. Tis brace takes care of that also by keeping my mouth closed. I tried numerous slings and straps to keep my mouth closed at night with no results; this brace clears up all problems.
customer_reviews.author: alanj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This product is well worth every cent. It's adjustable and the width is perfectly poportioned. I have two degenerated discs in my neck and from time to time I'm in a lot of pain. I needed something to support my neck during the rough times and when I sleep. This does the job perfectly. It's comfortable enough to sleep with it on. - Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: but it still offers nice support for her recovering neck when she gets tired
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom. Seems to work well for her. She has a very shallow neck, so she wears it backwards, but it still offers nice support for her recovering neck when she gets tired.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Vanderhoof

customer_reviews.title: What is the size that fits you best
customer_reviews.text: It’s not easy to fit yourself with the right size, everyone has different neck sizes. The size 3” is not high enough but how would you know if you didn’t try it on? It is made well and if 3” X 22” fits this is a good one
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Fly without fussing
customer_reviews.text: I hate neck pillows for flying or travel, my head always falls forward if I actually doze off and I end up stiff. This is a cheap solution that works and stays where you put it. Your spine will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kai L.

customer_reviews.title: Use this at night to relive stress on my neck ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this at night to relive stress on my neck. It does the job. Personally, I have not been able to sleep in it all night as I feel smothered.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and stiff, not expensive for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: Feels really stiff, bulky, tiresome to wear (especially if feeling hot), but seemed to do the job necessary if only could use part of the time. Was inexpensive so guess got my money's worth, but seemed cheap in quality too, oh well!
customer_reviews.author: Galekarens

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it’s what you need
customer_reviews.text: Not really what we needed so didn’t use it. Made cheaply though. Very thin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good collar for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. It is a universal fit (for adults) with the added extension tab. The sleeve doesn't wrap around the entire collar so some people might notice some itchiness around the uncovered areas.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Valusek

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly and is made well. Serves the purpose ...
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and is made well. Serves the purpose of giving my neck some pain relief when my arthritic neck is acting up. I bought it for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Moore

customer_reviews.title: I was extremely satisfied. The collar allowed stabilization of the neck without ...
customer_reviews.text: The support of the collar was what I was looking for. I was extremely satisfied. The collar allowed stabilization of the neck without discomfort to the head, chin or shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were for my husband and he was not overly impressed with them, said they were very stiff.
customer_reviews.author: MJA

customer_reviews.title: washable foam with soft feel to it.
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable to wear soft , yet sturdy , to hold neck in correct placement. Can remove and secure it with in seconds. would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Young

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Consider buying a colored one though.
customer_reviews.text: Id give it 5 stars if it was a colir other than white that shows any dirt or wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C

customer_reviews.title: Good head and neck support.
customer_reviews.text: This really relieve the pressure on my strained neck when I was up and about. I would definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great for transitioning from Miami J collar to no collar
customer_reviews.text: fits well. Great for transitioning from Miami J collar to no collar.
customer_reviews.author: Blessedmomma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes exactly what I needed to do hope my cervical vertebrae in place. I wear it everyday 90% of the day
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Trosper

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, But A Couple of Issues
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made collar, however I have two issues with it. First, it's hard. Yes, I know it's supposed to be strong enough to basically hold the weight of my head, but having used a cervical collar for years, this is, hands' down, just plain hard. It's almost as though it's not foam, but some unforgiving material. This equates with being uncomfortable, at least, for me. The second issue I have is that the 2" wide velcro in the back definitely keeps anything from moving or slipping, but at the same time, is also obnoxiously loud. I mean, LOUD. So, there you have it...pros and cons.
customer_reviews.author: MsHarmonyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have used this type of collar before. This one was so tight I could hardly stand to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: It was too small. I wanted to return it but it's non returnable. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Suzette

customer_reviews.title: turns out I did not need this collar, because ...
customer_reviews.text: turns out I did not need this collar, because the hospital gave one to me, and I ordered another which arrived way before this one arrived even though I ordered both at the same time. this collar is not returnable, even though I have not even opened it, so I am stuck with a third collar I do not need (and hope to never need in the future). other than that, I am sure that the quality if this collar is the same as the other two I have
customer_reviews.author: Jude H.

customer_reviews.title: It comes with a sock like cover that can be removed easily and washed as ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very well made. It comes with a sock like cover that can be removed easily and washed as necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: This was something I ordered for my sister, as ...
customer_reviews.text: This was something I ordered for my sister, as she has MS.. It looked as well made as any i have received from my Dr. I am going to order one for me because of my neck surgeries I sleep in one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Keeps neck stable but a bit uncomfortable for short necked people like myself.
customer_reviews.author: D Seb

customer_reviews.title: This item is NOT returnable
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this for a family member, I was not aware that it was unreturnable. The item was very stiff, uncomfortable and too large. Had I been aware of this, I would not have ordered it. My review is NO STAR, but since it was required to enter a star, this is why there is one.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Elaine

product_meta.title: Universal Cervical Collar White 3 Inch Padded Foam Neck Brace for Treating and Rehabilitating Neck, Head or Spinal Injuries | Properly Aligns, Limits Motion and Supports
feature_bullets: 3” COLLAR WIDTH: With a wall that measures 3” tall, these cervical collars by Healthstar meet industry standards for the average man or woman. (Use the padded cervical collar only under the close supervision of your physician.)
DURABLE FOAM CORE: Each cervical collar has been outfitted with an extra thick core that is made out of light density foam rubber. It lifts the neck and limits motion in order to speed up healing.

PREMIUM BREATHABLE MATERIALS: Our foam cervical collar is covered with a removable white Polyester stockinette to ensure it delivers the utmost level of convenience. The casing is warm and cozy, it's super soft and it's conveniently machine washable.
CONTOURED DESIGN: The contoured shape of the foam neck brace is what provides the high level of support you are looking for. It supports the jaw, spine, neck and head without causing any discomfort.
ADJUSTABLE SIZE: These universal cervical collars have been finished with a Velcro closure, which means the size of them can be adjusted as needed.
